bodyV2.markdown:
Stranger Things: The First Shadow is 3 hours inclusive of a 20 minute interval. For a 7:00PM performance, the show will finish at approximately 10PM. For regular matinee performances at 1:00PM the show will finish at roughly 5PM. Please note that on Sunday's the matinee performance begins at 3PM and so the show finishes at 6PM.

Book Tickets

content.name: How long is Stranger Things: The First Shadow and when does it finish?
